entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
